price: Nokorε sε onipa nni (akatua) bi, na mmom gyesε mmͻden a ͻbͻeε ho (akatua na ɔbwnya).
arabic: وَأَن لَّيۡسَ لِلۡإِنسَٰنِ إِلَّا مَا سَعَىٰ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-an laysa lil'insāni illā mā saʿā
